Reviews.Title: “Gem of a hotel in Madrid”

Reviews.Content: stayed principe pio coworkers night moving hotel conference hotel recomended friends stayed 8 ago booked included breakfast building clean comfortable quiet despite heatwave 104 degrees cool fortunately ac top floor staff friendly helpful front desk clerk map drew route walk short time location excellent plaza espana royal palace cathedral gran via close plenty shopping definitely recommend hotel
